thread.title: 9 Cleveland food startups to watch in 2017: Chacuterie, sweets, salsa and more
thread.title_full: 9 Cleveland food startups to watch in 2017: Chacuterie, sweets, salsa and more

author: Nikki Delamotte, cleveland.com
title: 9 Cleveland food startups to watch in 2017: Chacuterie, sweets, salsa and more
text: Cleveland has no shortage of craft food made right here in the city. And that small batch boom shows little sign of slowing. We asked a few emerging startups about the challenges and rewards of launching a food operation.
